actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to entitle veterans to 45 months of educational assistance for all educational programs under chapter 34 of this title.

summary.text: Entitles veterans to a maximum of forty-five months of educational assistance for all veterans educational assistance programs if such veterans have served eighteen months of active duty and have satisfied their active duty obligations.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to entitle veterans to 45 months of educational assistance for all educational programs under chapter 34 of this title.
